Bury St Edmunds Mobile Library Route 13

Contact us:

Managers: Steve Adams and Kevin Lambert

Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk

Telephone: 01473 263838

Route timetable

Stop Village Location Time
13A Whepstead Community Hall 0930-1000
13B Whepstead Three Ways 1005-1020
13C Hawkedon Old ‘Queens Head’ 1030-1050

13E Hartest Green 1115-1145

13I Stanstead Valley View 1300-1315
13J Shimpling Street Post Box 1420-1435
13K Hartest Top of the Hill 1445-1510
13L Hartest Cross Green 1515-1530
13M Brockley Village Hall 1535-1615

Calling every 4 weeks on Fridays:

2016: 29 January, 26 February, no visit in March, 22 April, 20 May, 17 June, 15 July, 12 August, 9 September, 7 October, 4 November, 2 December, 30 December
